tb_piso
module tb_piso ()

Test bench for piso. Pump in data to parallel port on each count == 0.

Instantiated Modules
piso
piso #(
.
BUS_WIDTH(1)
) dut ( .clk(tb_clk), .rstn(tb_rstn), .ena(tb_ena), .rev(1'b0), .load(tb_load), .pdata(tb_pdata), .sdata(tb_sdata), .dcount(tb_dcount) )

Device under test, parallel to serial
